= Fedora Core 7 =

== Binary packages ==
Packages are available for both linkage and rb_libtorrent, all you have to do is run the following as root.
{{{
yum -y install boost gtkmm24 libnotify curl dbus-glib libupnp
rpm -ivh http://linkage.googlecode.com/files/rb_libtorrent-0.12-1.fc7.i386.rpm
rpm -ivh http://linkage.googlecode.com/files/linkage-0.1.2-1.fc7.i386.rpm
}}}

== Subversion install ==
If you want the latest SVN version install the dependencies and rb_libtorrent as above, then do the following.
{{{
yum -y install subversion
svn checkout http://linkage.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ linkage
cd linkage
./autogen.sh --prefix=/usr
make
make install
}}}

= Ubuntu Feisty 7.04 =

== Source install ==
Currently there are no packages for rb_libtorrent nor linkage for Ubuntu. So if you want to install linkage you have to build them both from source. Libtorrent can be downloaded [http://sourceforge.net/project/downloading.php?group_id=79942&filename=libtorrent-0.12.tar.gz here], linkage source code is available from the [http://code.google.com/p/linkage/downloads/list downloads] page or from [http://code.google.com/p/linkage/source SVN].

{{{
sudo apt-get install build-essential
sudo apt-get install libboost-date-time-dev libboost-date-time1.33.1 \
libboost-filesystem-dev libboost-filesystem1.33.1 libboost-regex-dev \
libboost-regex1.33.1 libboost-signals-dev libboost-signals1.33.1 \
libboost-thread-dev libboost-thread1.33.1 libboost-dev
cd libtorrent-0.12
./configure --prefix=/usr
make
sudo make install
}}}

{{{
sudo apt-get install libgtkmm-2.4-dev libnotify-dev libcurl3-dev libupnp-dev \
libdbus-glib-1-dev libgtkmm-2.4-1c2a libnotify1 libcurl3 libupnp0 libdbus-glib-1-2
cd linkage-0.1.2
./configure --prefix=/usr
make
sudo make install
}}}
